question.text:
The species that can have a trans-isomer is:
(en = ethane-1, 2-diamine, ox=oxalate)

options.text: <math><msup><mrow><mfenced open="[" close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>

<math><mfenced open="[" close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced open="[" close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced open="[" close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>

solution.text:
Pten2Cl22+ Dichlorido-bis (ethane – 1, 2 – diamine) Platinum (IV) ion
Show geometrical isomers
